EmailTemplate.name: 202012_Global_CPS_Quote-Automation_Email_Operational.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Portal Updates – New Quote to Order Feature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Online Ordering and Spares Quote Status have been combined - In order to make the Spares Quoting process easier from finding a part to quote to taking action on that quote and ordering the part; Honeywell has moved the Quote Status functionality within our Online Ordering application. Your quote status and quoting history for Spares can now be found by navigating to “Online Ordering and Quoting” and clicking on the “My Quotes” option in the applications menu bar.
Key Features for Spares Quotes:
- A new quote cart is next to the orders cart to make it clear if a part is getting quoted versus ordered - Automation will provide faster turnaround - Email notifications when quotes are updated - View and order company quotes versus quotes submitted by individual users
Click HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/quote-faqs]]> to learn more about the key changes for Spares Quotes in the portal.
Click HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes/2020/quote-status-online-ordering]]> to access the release notes for Spares Quotes.
Reports and Notifications – To receive reports and notifications for your orders via email, please visit the training topic page on how to turn this functionality ON and modify per your needs: How do I receive orders reports & notifications? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/order-status/reports-notifications]]>
To view the individual release notes for the items listed above and to catch up on latest improvements to MyAerospace, please refer to and bookmark our Release Notes page: RELEASE NOTES <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/ol/j0hSdMzNL1xQsRogv62oC5G0zmeNKMr-6-gwRLq1gJZogAVuYOPLdQyi3oMBSsd0aPqZCAZNQ9ZlyQgFSqaGct0QvPBUDxy4XSjsiaLbIYtBY6dx2dNm36Cq1mUcvdiOnhLPBkJIVXhoOVfJOOt30mi2dpMrWgCMyW7MaNV1yXtQ1eVC04q_b7LpvTXm/jE5Uc8zPI1lNoVdlsbPWI6z_kCbQe5ut9bRyB_L_xcoy1QZ9feGAPU-ghNZQDpx9ZOuRFBZdBoMuwQ5XD_TYcZlB_-dSGFGzWz6wkqTWaoxddPl909Vk7Peo03Q6vtKJz1nVI18nSn5lUAqvS5Jw0WvRBKYiaVO96E_0B7QivwEbrLM1372iV5i13GPw9mz0_gbdPGlQ6PfL7gyGIq5dreQ4700lwwE2Z-HT0WDzyY4zngNroO4muy5A3vBlI8Ja9SKCaz3Q6LrgYcB-ZZvhqbHzitcMaysFo4QbVWHUDgqbJNuyKSNW4kK-ozpsBx1IdB1AJL0ZuhimvCh4Xu87aAOfyBMK8lsPz6tv0t_OiSubX1uzbxfWjxGv0huVGrUz0HakveUSwQfNAybA3N4xf2-UPdyG]]> For training topics pages related to the portal, please refer to and bookmark this page: TRAINING TOPICS <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/ol/j0hSdMDGLVxQsRogv62oC5G0zmeNKMr-6-gwRLq1gJZogAVuYOPLdQyi3oMBSsd0aPqZCAZNQ9ZlyQgFSqaGct0QvPBUDxy4XSjsiaLbIYtBY6dx2dNm36Cq1mUcvdiOnhLPBkJIVXhoOVfJOOt30mi2dpMrWgCMyW7MaNV3xX5Y1epC04q_b7LpvTXm/jExYdsTPLFlNoVdlsbPWI6z_kCbQe5ut9bRyB_L_xcoy1QZ9feGAPU-ghNZQDpx9ZOuRFBZdBoMu1B5ZE-6ccocP7vpNAkKhBzb0lJ7OYIYTdK1ZzOhr8KGR1FInh43XxGr4P044EEt-UDOvWr4DrS7OPqEqcAqt0XrmJdcgtBoatu4M7r-nS-Owq0mOwnPw3wzeOFBWtdGB63mOWa1hqcE2mhFx6gEQT8_e7yLEyY4wmC0O7N97uARB3uxVDppRsxK_dAHn0b3QTt1ATbCVwcrZ7dd5bjkk2rcbdDrnD33hIpC1KxVZ-TCNxRcRNQ5ABRsKM8YYpj6fvk1WId02QiqDu3Bz80cP1KxAyrzLhR6Dak7MBRLajAqZ7iGDGNMs6EGhsYY,]]> Please be sure to Opt-In to receive important portal enhancement update emails.
